course.title: MAT 2348 Discrete Mathematics (3 units)
course.desc: Quick review of: sets, functions, relations, induction, basic counting techniques. An in-depth treatment of recurrence relations, generating functions, and principle of inclusion-exclusion. Aspects of graph theory.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 1341, (MAT 1348 or MAT 1325 or MAT 1362 or MAT 2362 or MAT 2141).
